title: Dear riot, fix the bug
body:
Pls fix the Hecarim{{champion:120}}  ult.
Every time when a friend use the ult, nothign happens.
no damage, no terror

replies.body: I never saw this "Hecarim Bug" and I am maining Hecarim and Cassiopeia. I see nearly every second game a Hecarim but never saw this bug. If you say "every time", than please show a video review
